com.salimov.yurii.entity.interfaces

Interface IMessage<E extends java.lang.Number>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, IModel<E>, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Message

    public interface IMessage<E extends java.lang.Number>
extends IModel<E>
    The interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Message class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yuriy Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Message, IModel
